tvdb: Elizabeth tells Alison she may have found her sister in Canada. Ali gets a call from the girl's mother, then plans to fly with Elizabeth to meet her. Jamal demands Marissa quit Stephen's band but she refuses.  When he says he loves her, she says she loves him too and agrees to quit. Livvie accuses Tess of being jealous, then tricks her into opening a trunk, pushes her in and traps her. Rafe shoots the wooden stake before Jack can kill Stephen, then tells Jack that Stephen may not be Caleb. Stephen vows payback for the attempted murder. Rafe & Jack end up in jail as Stephen boards Ali's private jet before it takes off.
